name: Randomice
description:
A procedural Metroid-like with no fights, focused on exploration and route-planning, in which you play a mouse trying to escape from an ever-changing house.

Each run is a compact Metroid-like experience, in which you will find upgrades to explore the house differently each time. From a magnetic grapple to reach a metallic faucet, to a rideable rocket that can burst through the glass blocking the way, you will find many upgrades, each with its own uses.

You must adapt to the tools in your possession to determine where you can go, the thrill of the game coming both from the platforming mastery, but also from the mental mapping of where you can go in the house at any given time. When you obtain a new item, you need to update this mental map to determine the best possibilities, optimize your path, and decide where to go next to maximize the chances to exit quickly.

The ability to follow an efficient path is important during races, in which all the competing players will have the same game configuration and must exit the house as fast as they can. But the game is also designed to be enjoyed solo and slowly, thanks to a single-player progression that lets each player discover the challenges at their own pace.

description: The 13th Taiko no Tatsujin, released on December 2009 just five months after the wildly successful Taiko 12.5. Taiko 13 takes the game to new heights, being the first version to be used in a nationwide (Japan, of course) official Taiko no Tatsujin tournament in April 2010. In terms of new features, again it doesn't introduce many new things, except a slight change in the Children/Folk genre name from Kanji to hiragana.

name: Rankdle
description:
Rankdle is an interactive game for content creators to react to their viewer submissions!
Players challenge themselves to rank things and go head-to-head with the content creator.

name: Super Press Space To Win Adventure RPG 2009
description: The kingdom of Arcurie is in peril, will you be able to save it from the forces of darkness? Super PSTW Action RPG is sure to blow your socks off with its revolutionary, yet streamlined gameplay! Feel free to jump right in, all controls are listed in game!

name: Plasma Ball
description: Defeat as many creatures as you can while trying to escape the planet Odessia Millennia.

name: Coinbox Hero
description: Man those coinboxes are trouble. Take this one down with everything you got! Hire hands to help you loot and plunder. When you’re ready to take it down…. a tactical nuke is just around the corner.

name: Farmington Tales 2: Winter Crop
description: Explore snowy Dahlia Farms in a unique combination of hidden object game and farming simulation. Floyd and Dahlia have retired and Kaylee has taken over, but winter is setting in and she's a bit out of her element. Search your property for items to sell in the market, plant and harvest crops, and buy new upgrades to fix up the farm.

name: Fashion Forward
description: After opening a hot new boutique, and drawing the ire of a major magazine editor, Risha stands determined to prove that great fashion is both flattering and unique. Help Risha launch her new line, win over her many detractors, and convince the famous fashion magazine editor that fashion should be for everyone.

name: Coppélive
description:
A modern retelling of the classic tale of Coppélia as a short, linear, erotic visual novel.

Comedy! Romance! Sex! Degeneracy!

Book your seats for the steamy tale of Coppélive!

name: Fiona's Dream of Atlantis
description: The little mermaid Fiona has fallen in love with the statue of a warrior. She wants to bring the warrior back to life, but the only force capable of such a feat is very dangerous. Fiona must survive by navigating many obstacles and solving match 3 puzzles.

name: A part of me
description: The target audience for this game is one single person in the whole world.

name: Infierno Rubí
description: Sin descripción

name: Flightpath: Adventures in Venaris
description:
Blast through a story-driven shoot’em up where your choices drastically alter the experience!

With multiple paths, unique content for each pilot you choose, specific tasks to complete, procedurally generated levels and unpredictable enemy attack patterns across 10 stages.

name: Fire Emblem Warriors + Season Pass Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Fire Emblem Warriors: Season Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombiewood: Survival Shooter
description: SOS: Hollywood becomes a zombie playground! Load up your fire and go solo in a shooting rampage, or team up for explosive co-op fun!

name: Melt Down
description: Melt it all!

name: Spring Bunny Islands
description: Seek serenity in hand-painted "Spring Bunny Islands". Uncover 200 playful bunnies hidden amongst the vibrant blooms of 9 unique islands.

name: Deadland Chronicles
description: Deadland Chronicles promises endless hours of excitement and challenge.

name: Heisting
description: What could be more exciting than the thrill of a perfectly performed heist?

name: WN RPG Hoshi no Kuzure
description: It's a JRPG. A heartwarming world. Turn-based battle. A simple Mini-games.

name: 3 Shots Left
description: A slow burn retro horror game set in the English countryside. In the apocalypse ammo is scarce and you only have 3 shots left. Make them count!

name: 100 Kills Challenge: Origins
description: Enter the fray in an intense, fast paced first person shooter experience. Kill using firearms, explosives, drones, and air support. Dominate maps in deathmatch, team, and PVE. Win with tactics - or sheer brutality. Remember: Hundred kills. One arena. Zero rules. May the best player win!

name: 100 Funny Cats: Extra Content
description: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Funny Cats. Get an extra level with 100 more adorable cats!

name: 6-nen 1-gumi
description: I went to school that night to pick up something I forgot... Aim for class 1 of 6th grade, and if there are no abnormalities, go up the stairs, and if there are any abnormalities, go down the stairs.

name: Ainsley
description: A mysterious package arrives at your door, but don't worry, it's your new best friend Ainsley! Build them, calibrate them, talk to them, teach them to be just like you and one day they just might talk back! But not everything is as it seems...

name: Alice Through the Fey Realm
description: Alice Through the Fey Realm is an enchanting isometric narrative adventure that thrusts you into the shoes of Alice. A compelling adventure unfolds as you awaken in the mysterious Fey Realm and embark on a quest to discover the key to your journey home.

name: Furious Flappers
description: Your Flappers are furious and ready to kick some Hog butt. Help them destroy the evil Hogs and bring peace to their world!

name: Naruto x Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connection - DLC Pack 2
description: A DLC pack containing additional content for NARUTO X BORUTO Ultimate Ninja STORM CONNECTIONS.

name: Cardboard Chronicles
description: Welcome to Doodleburg! You play Doodle, a child who has been transported into a cardboard world of their own creation. Not all is well in the Burg of Doodle. An ancient, extradimensional evil has awoken and it's up to you to save this idyllic town from its ravenous rampage.

name: Spirit of Death
description: It is a full mode gunfight competitive game, with directional keys to move characters and space keys to jump. With a full 3D perspective, a refreshing shooting style with stunning visual effects, players can enjoy the thrill of gunfights amidst the hustle and bustle of gunfire. This is a brand new challenge, are you willing to be a part of it? Let's take on a challenge together!

name: Stay Sane
description: You stay up until late at night, trying to gather evidence of the anomalies you have been witnessing the last months. The more photos you can capture, the better, but don't forget: you are not alone. There's something with you, constantly watching you, just waiting for you to miss out on an anomaly.

name: Quad Battle
description: Quad Battle is a brand new monopoly game with auto battler, in the 4v4v4v4 party game, your actions need luck, your victories depend on teammates, and you just need to enjoy the game!

name: ATV Bike Games
description: Welcome to the world of quad bike games with real physics. This cool ATV racing game will not leave anyone indifferent! Ride bikes through realistic locations, compete and have fun! Play with your friends online!

name: Beyond
description: Beyond is a sci-fi turn-based strategy game set in a generated solar system that orbits a distant star every round. Play as one of five alien species as you race to collect resources, build your military, develop new tech, expand the area you control, and drive opposing factions from the system.

name: Night Bus
description: Night Bus is a thrilling public transit simulator that costs less than a bus ticket! It's your first night on the job: Pick up passengers, take their fares, enjoy the beautiful countryside, and please ignore That Which Has No Eyes.

name: Wind Rider
description: Wind Rider is simple, relaxing gliding game with an endless map and Randomly generated Obstacles. A great game to fill your free time and beat your latest highest score!

name: The Zombie Wave
description: 《Zombie》 Wave is a low polygon cartoon style third person shooter game where players need to protect cute cartoon characters from damage, use a variety of weapon choices and strategies, challenge enemies, and engage in thrilling defense battles.

name: Math Pixels
description: Engage in pixel strategy: calculate sums to colorize rows and columns. Dive into a minimalist challenge of precision and calculation.

name: Fear the Moon
description: A story driven cryptid horror game about a werewolf creature named "the Wolfman". Play as Jane along with her three friends who unknowingly camp the night in The Wolfman's territory deep inside an Ohio forest.

name: Izanami
description: Ninja Town is a cozy game that combines ninjas, adventure, farming, and town-building set in Ancient Japan.

name: Ghoul Fort
description: Ghoul Fort is a mix of RTS and visual novel. Follow the story of a disgraced commander as he tries to feed his people, keep his armies on a leash, and satisfy his own ravenous empire. All the while, another force schemes to unleash hell on the entire system. Forward, into the breach!

name: Emoji Survival
description: Embark on an epic journey, facing thousands of enemies in our Emoji Roguelike

name: Space Combat
description: Space Combat is a single-player shooter-runner game in the vast universe. Experience a beautiful universe with massive spaceships, robots, and creatures.

name: Ray: Part 1
description: Play as Ray, a mercenary, in this fully voiced updated remake of the 2003 Newgrounds classic. Your decisions have real impact in an enhanced narrative with improved graphics.

name: Skybase
description: Spaceship building sandbox game. Build various spaceships from scratch and explore the cosmos. Fight different enemies and mine metals and materials to fix or expand your spaceship fleet.

name: Spaceborne Survivors
description: Slice, dice and blow up thousands of enemy ships! Spaceborne Survivors is a sci-fi casual game with rogue-lite elements, where your choices can allow you to become a mecha menace against huge enemy fleets invading your space system.

name: Featherbound
description: A flightless bird named Pip wants to prove the world wrong and summit the top of the tree he calls home. Help Pip solve physics-based puzzles and navigate the tree's seemingly endless branches all the way up. Can you make it to the top of the tree?

name: Egging On
description: Face the challenge of being a real, fragile egg. Climb out of the hen house and survive in a shop, a kitchen, and other dangerous areas. Roll, jump, and use the environment to reach new heights. Don't break your eggshell, and do your best not to fall. With determination, you may reach freedom!

name: Martial Arts: God of War
description: "Martial arts-God of War" is a massively multiplayer online game (MMORPG). The game provides players with a lot of different quality equipment, and the pursuit of high-level (or best) equipment is one of the most important goals for players in the game.

name: Cave Escape
description: An indie 2D top-down maze escape puzzler. Get out of each maze before your light runs out and try get the highscore for each level!

name: Fractured Mind
description: This is a PT inspired psychological horror game, with a bodycam style.

name: Sun Is Dead
description: As a scavenger, you navigate procedurally generated levels combating hordes of living shadows hungry for light. Your mission: survive, upgrade, and reach the next shelter. Unique mechanics blend horror, roguelike, and survivor-like elements, offering players a relentless challenge.

name: PostLife
description: A surreal Exploration-based RPG all about experiencing a comical, yet bizarre mansion! Follow Wade, your typical teenage cat thing who only enjoys two things. Silence and getting high!

name: An Eternity Gone By
description: Use your telekinetic powers to hurl watermelons, lamp posts, toilets and more at the monsters roaming this strange yet familiar world. You’ll take the role of Mirai: a young sorceress trying to save her friend from the monsters who’ve abducted her.

name: ARC: Antic Runes Combat
description: Classic 2D Arcade with Gamepad available! You are "Shadow", a lost soul who has the mission to rescue other souls after the great apocalypse. New for Steam Launch, Events and FREE DLC "Underworld" includes in version 1.5.

name: Gzlna
description: Her name is Gloria, and the pleasure is all yours. Gzlna is a short arcade / cinematic experience, with fast-paced combat and tight controls.

name: Super Marlin Bros
description: An indie 2.5D platformer about an old hero, inspired by series: Super Mario Bros, Mayro, Mario Dolor. Old Marlin wants a drink of milk, but oh no, there is no more in the fridge. Now he needs to go to the shop to buy more, but things don't go as usual.

name: Wizard Another World
description: Wizard Another World - is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. While fighting monsters, you must collect magical artifacts that your enemies have stolen in order to restore the balance between light and darkness.

name: Hotel Perkkow and the Two Vegetarian Werewolves
description: Let's keep it simple. Detective arrives to Bucarest. Missing guest in a small hotel. And hawaian pizza. If you want to know how those things blend together... Just press the start button.

name: Lazerz
description: The fast paced free to play arena shooter. Master the art of hydraulic power movement, fly like an angel through the arena and shoot with powerful ricocheting lazerz to obliterate your enemies with style!

name: Lanista: Shadows and Dust
description: A Tactical Roguelike about the life (and death) of post-apocalyptic gladiators in a dystopian society. Embrace the arena, become the LANISTA!

name: The Thing That Happened
description: Thing That Happened is an Openworld Third Person - Action Adventure Survial game. You can use multiple weapons, attachments, close combat skills tree's and crafting to break through your enemies.

name: Crown Code Chronicles
description: Crown Code Chronicles is a story-driven, JRPG style game with a tactical, active turn-based combat system. Inspired by titles like Chrono Cross, FFX, Child Of Light, and more. Experience this emotional roller coaster as Varien; a prince who uses an ancient relic to time travel to save his loved ones

name: Poop Spotter: The Game To Improve the Quality of Poop~
description: Monitor the line of the poop factory and find out the defective products. This is a "spot the difference" game with poop.

name: Dope Wars Mean Streets
description: Mean Streets offers pixelated 90s nostalgia with rich storytelling. Join gangs, engage in shootouts, and explore the underworld. Play solo or with friends for an immersive experience in a retro world.

name: Fruitio
description: A relaxing, fun and creative physics based puzzle game. Take time out in Fruitio wold and chillax!

name: School Paranormal Laboratory
description: To those who will become investigators at our research institute, Our institute conducts research on mysterious phenomena and grudges that occur in schools. As an investigator, you will carry out field surveys, but it is a simple job that even those with no experience can perform.

name: TypeSpell Journey
description: It is a relaxing and casual software suitable for users of all ages. It can be used to learn words, practice spelling or typing. It can be a game or an educational tool, depending on how you use it.

name: Emblems: Sunless Vow
description: Escape the void...and destroy its heart. A collision between three lost souls ends in a surprise trip to purgatory, where vengeful spirits abound. These unlikely friends must uncover the secrets of their past to escape—but can they stop arguing first?

name: Fear of Fear
description: Arachnophobia, Trypophobia, and Thalassophobia are just some of the horrors that await you. Choose your phobia and conquer your fear.

name: Apartment No 129
description: Emir, who has an interest in mysterious events, steps alone into the abandoned apartment known as "Apartment No 129" to trace the trail of a paranormal event that occurred in 2009 and shook the country. However, he will find himself in an unexpected confrontation within this cursed apartment.

name: Dungeon Ruins
description: Dungeon Ruins is a 2D platformer with roguelike elements in which you will find yourself in the shoes of a brave pioneer exploring mysterious dungeons full of treasures and dangers. You have to go through multi-story labyrinths filled with various enemies, riddles and treasures.

name: Fall Of The MS Estonia
description: Step into the shoes of a passenger aboard the ill-fated MS Estonia in this immersive simulation. Discover what caused the ship's demise on the tragic day of 27th September 1994. With time running out, are you able to find a way off the ship?

name: Warehouse Manager Simulator
description: In "Warehouse Manager Simulator", step into the shoes of a burgeoning entrepreneur with ambitions to conquer the logistics industry. Begin your journey by acquiring your first warehouse and a humble forklift, ready to embark on a path towards warehouse management mastery.

name: Bad Mechanic
description: Bad Mechanic is a tower-defense action roguelike. Plan (and improvise) your defenses against a swarm of weird little guys. Dodge your own towers' attacks as you collect loot. Build a unique arsenal of towers and items in each run that will kill you in spectacular fashion.

name: Ostallian Core
description: A modern omnidirectional space shooter with colorful retro-style ASCII art and light RPG elements, featuring optional permadeath.

name: Incline: Railway of Devil's Valley
description: An action adventure with a quirky battle system that uses an inclined railway to carry and seal devils to a sacred boundary. Robbed of his weapons, the unarmed hero must keep dodging devil attacks in the cargo bed of an inclined railway until he reaches the sacred boundary at top floor of village!

name: Eggstraction
description: Eggstraction is a multiplayer (4vs1) heist game where four feathered friends must face off against an egg-napping farmer. With chaos around every corner, can the chickens rescue their stolen eggs, or will they end up back in their cage?

name: Cubik
description: Cubik is a minimalist puzzle game revolving around cubes. Rotate them to the right color where they melt into the background. Join Cubik for a soothing brain exercise.

name: Operação Prato
description: 'Operação Prato' is a game based on one of Brazil's greatest ufological mysteries. Step into the shoes of Mario, the reporter who will risk his own life to expose the entire truth about the events that terrified the residents of the Colares region.

name: Bitesize Heroes: Forest Defender
description: Prepare for an epic battle in this captivating blend of real-time strategy and tower defense! Build, defend, and triumph as you strategically place towers, manage resources, and upgrade your arsenal to fend off relentless waves of enemies.

name: Dark Rampage
description: Dark Rampage is an 2D platformer with action elements where you play as a hero who finds himself in a dark and dangerous world after he falls into a dark well. You have to explore various locations, fight monsters and solve puzzles.

name: Mysterious Planet
description: Mysterious Planet - A fascinating 3D puzzle game for logic and thinking! Your ship is forced to land on a mysterious planet due to lack of fuel. And now a mysterious and fascinating world filled with puzzles opens up before you!

name: Hitobashira: Human Suika
description: A fun human fusion puzzle game, merge people to sacrifice them and feed their souls to the Monolith.

name: Infinity Blaster
description: In Infinity Blaster you blast through space, defeat challenging enemies and upgrade your weapons! Compete on the global leaderboard, survive an infinite loop of increasingly difficult foes, and unlock 98achievements. Can you prove yourself as the ultimate space adventurer?

name: Pinhead Adventures
description: The First Game from Neversold Studios, Pinhead Adventures is a planet hopping, gun toting, sword swinging, grappling adventure! Zortan has killed every last living soul except for the Pinhead and Orbo. Join Pinhead and Orbo to fight Zortan in this 3D Action Platformer!

name: Trench Defender
description: An action-packed FPS where you defend your trench against waves of attacking enemies by utilizing a large selection of modern (and not so modern) military weapons, features both single-player and two player online multiplayer (peer-to-peer).

name: So, This Vampire Walks Into a Bar
description: Join our broke protagonist Jackie, who, after a workplace accident, will never look the same again. Jackie desperately tries to make ends meet by working in an unusual bar, despite having no experience at all!

name: The Echo Escape
description: Escape from the suspicious space by eluding [them].

name: Just Wing It
description: Just Wing it is a multiplayer Collect-o-thon where you can explore different worlds and hangout with friends. Oh yeah. You are also a rubber duck...

name: Case: Online
description: Case: Online is a fangame based of Case 2: Animatronics Survival Multiplayer.

name: RestorArt: Fairwood Hills - Collector's Edition
description: Embark on a captivating journey as an art restorer in the charming town of Fairwood Hills. Uncover hidden stories as you mend torn canvases, remove stickers, and restore burnt edges.

name: Lightist
description: This is an interesting physics puzzle game. You can create objects arbitrarily to interact with light. Your gole is to make the light cast on all of the stars in the scene. So let's unleash our imagination and enjoy this game.

name: Crazy Destruction
description: Crazy Destruction is a 3D physics puzzle game in which fun and exciting levels of varying difficulty await you! Take control of a mechanical cannon and destroy everything in your path! Using tactics and thinking, calculate every shot you take, because you're running out of ammunition!

name: True Story Time
description: "True Story Time" - the ultimate party game that guarantees endless laughter and unforgettable moments with friends!

name: Frozen Below: Arctic Expedition
description: "Frozen Below: Arctic Expedition" is a horror exploration game. Explore an Arctic cave, uncover secrets, and escape a lurking presence. With realistic graphics and immersive sound design, can you survive the frozen terror and escape the darkness?

name: Dungeons and Ducklings
description: Dungeons and Ducklings is a Retro - PacMan - Roguelite Adventure. Help Mama Duck rescue her ducklings from the evil Lich by navigating his dark dungeon. Use powerful attacks to create your own path through the Lich's maze.

name: Happy Sheepies
description: Happy Sheepies is a relaxing sheep-farming game that includes some Crafting and Business Management elements with its simple Drag & Drop gameplay. Meet the needs of your sheepies, craft and sell your products, and grow your business!

name: Cube Lands: The Final Wish
description: Welcome to the world of Cube Lands! Solve puzzles using elemental blocks and various other unique and innovative mechanics. Travel through forests, caves, deserts, mountains and much more to defeat the Eye. Be careful, it is always watching...

name: Project L33t
description: Dive into Project L33T, a hardcore first-person tactical extraction shooter. Confront AI foes and rival players, engage in high-stakes battles for precious loot, and risk all your gear to collect, secure, and extract Artifacts in this hostile environment.

name: Kings And Goblins
description: Try your best with this old-school difficult platformer game. Kings and Goblins will truly test your skill, will you be able to beat the game??

name: Slime Mayhem
description: You were created by a few scientists for a suicide mission. How long can you survive by clearing mutant slimes?

name: SpectroPhobia
description: "SpectroPhobia" is a spine-chilling adventure where you must outsmart the shadows in a haunted mansion. Find hidden objects, solve puzzles, and evade the lurking entity. Uncover the mansion's dark secrets to survive.

name: Dawn of the Ashen Queen
description: Dawn of the Ashen Queen is a classic grid-based dungeon crawler. Set out with your party to reveal the legacy of a millennia old curse in a narrative-rich experience. Explore the colorful world of Eshavon, unearth its many secrets and fight dangerous foes sent out to stop you in your mission.

name: Sacred Safar
description: Immerse in VR at Kolanupaka Jain Temple, Hyderabad. Photorealistic graphics bring every detail to life. Perform Aarti, attend Pooja, explore hidden chambers, and uncover ancient legends. Embark on a spiritual journey like never before.

name: Heaven Stairs
description: Where shadows whispered secrets and moonlight danced with forgotten memories

name: Barnacles Beers and Brawls
description: Barnacles, Beers, and Brawls is a fast-paced bar management game. You are a tavern bar manager in a world filled with plundering pirates and tentacled monstrosities. Hurry through a stylized map playing microgames themed around bartending duties like pouring a glass of beer or cleaning up a mess

name: BouncyBirdy
description: A simple bird game, have fun playing :)

name: OG Memory: Synthwave Monsters
description: OG Memory: Synthwave Monsters/b] is an memory game with scary monster images. You have to find all of the correct pairs to complete the game. your best round will be count and always be displayed in game, to compare your rounds. try to reduce your turns every game and set up your new record.

name: Super Media Hero
description: Hurl emojis and battle the internet's biggest stars to become a SUPER MEDIA HERO. Collect powerful perks and relics, enjoy a darkly comic social media story, and assemble the ultimate emoji attack stack in this roguelite idle RPG.

name: Wild Animals Transporter
description: The world keeps changing

name: Veil of Madness
description: Veil of Madness is a Lovecraftian Deck Builder game that merges the strategic charm of a deck builder with the immersive experience of a first-person RPG genre. Unravel eldritch secrets, battle insanity, and shape your destiny in this chilling journey.

name: Last Loremaster
description: Harness the power of the six cardinal elements in Last Loremaster, a high-octane ARPG set in a stunning mythological world. Play as Jahir, a powerful Elemental Loremaster combatting the encroaching Unravelling as you seamlessly freeze, burn, crush, and electrocute your foes!

name: Six Blow: Bullet Rain
description: "Six Blow: Bullet Rain" combines FPS action with living bullet cards. Survive the Wild West, customize your shots, and strategize!

name: Recipiente
description: It is a game that challenges the player's memory and quick decision making, using a scheme of colors and shapes in which the solution is to stay focused and have sharp reflexes in a spatial atmosphere that can be used to your advantage depending on its agility.

name: Vambrace: Dungeon Monarch
description: Vambrace: Dungeon Monarch is a unique combination of Deck-Building and Dungeon Defense, with a wide variety of military units and combinations, strategies and magic manifested in cards. Make your dungeon more dangerous by defending it against increasingly powerful enemies.

name: Nooo! My Body!
description: Breathtaking jump and run with an incredible story and unforgettable gameplay, in which you control a severed head! Don't forget to vote this masterpiece as Game of the Year.

name: NMO: No More Operators
description: NMO is a thrilling multiplayer (5 vs 1) game where one player, the Ox, lurks in the shadows to deceive and neutralize the Operators, while others take on the role of Operators, working independently or cooperatively to identify and eliminate the Ox hidden among them.

name: Caracoles
description: Hilarious like a fart... but longer! In Caracoles you compete against your pals in the fastest outrageously slow racing multiplayer battles ever.

name: BrokenLore: Follow
description: BrokenLore: Follow is a captivating psychological first-person horror game that immerses players in the haunting narrative of Anne, as she grapples with issues of self-acceptance, bullying, and worthlessness while encountering metaphorical surreal creatures that heighten the terror of her journey.

name: The Mystery of the Cardboard Island
description: Become a delivery person on the Cardboard Island. Chat with your friends and neighbors, explore and play minigames, deliver strange boxes and fight through the nightmares where your island is being destroyed by demons. Are you ready to solve the Mystery?

name: Coastal Defense
description: Coastal Defense is a replayable top-down tower defense game inspired by real-world coastal defense structures. Buy and upgrade your coastal defenses to defeat incoming navies!

name: Gung Beetle
description: Gung Beetle is a satisfying twin-stick bullet heaven where you play as a dung beetle covering your ball in ridiculous weaponry. Upgrade your guns part by part to build out insane combos and lay waste to thousands of enemies. Become the Gung Beetle.

name: Paintball: The Puzzle Game
description: Paintball is a top down puzzle game for 1 to 3 players. Copy given colored geometric shapes by throwing a ball back and forth.

name: Sempra Infernalis
description: Fight your way out of hell against the increasingly dangerous hellspawn devoted to making YOU, the latest addition to the unhappy infernal family. Upgrade your character to improve your chances of escape and seek out and unlock legendary weapons and abilities in this epically fun demon slayer.

name: Exploding Pandas
description: Are you tired of never being top 1 in Fortnite? Well, Exploding Pandas isn't about winning, just not sucking more than the others. For only 0€, it would be a shame to miss out on one of your rare opportunities to shine.

name: Damn Sewer
description: An indie horror game in which you find yourself in a mysterious abandoned sewer where people disappear. At first there is nothing unusual, but gradually you realize that something terrible lives in the sewer.

name: Celeros
description: Introducing Celeros, the future of racing. A world built on risk and reward, brought to life through the competition of racing! The official game of the Airspeeder flying car racing series!

name: Hive Dive
description: A roguelite on-rails shooter where you pilot a remote-controlled drone into hordes of a vast, everchanging swarm of alien bugs. Shoot down enemies and fly through colourful hives to take down the queen of the swarm.

name: Golden Lap
description: Step into the polished shoes of a racing team manager in the heart-stirring Golden Era of motorsport where every decision can lead to glory or gravel. With sleek minimalist charm and deep strategic gameplay, Golden Lap offers a unique experience in the motorsport management genre.

name: Dungeon Divers
description: Dungeon Divers is a dungeon-themed puzzle game about clearing derelict dungeons. As the newest employee of Dungeon Divers Inc., you must advance through multiple procedural generated levels, use your wits, and tools you acquire along the way to get to the core to defuse it and bring home the cash.

name: Marked: The Quest for Tripura
description: A single player puzzle exploration game where you play as Dee, short for Drauni, explore the ruins of Hampi, solving turn based puzzles, to find a way to escape your past and make it to the lost cities of Tripura. The puzzles reveal the origins of Chess and the long buried secrets of your ancestors.

name: Inverted Angel
description: A girl visited your home, who you don't know but she identified herself as your girlfriend. She seems a little bit Menhera, but she knows too much to be just a stalker. This is a Kawaii Future Mystery, the AI judges your guesses for branching story. Please Try to find out true identity of her.

name: The Disorder
description: The Disorder is a single-player psychological horror game inspired by the Backrooms. Experience heart-pounding gameplay traversing multi-dimensional levels solving conundrums while resisting enslavement by your mind.

name: Cats in the Ancient City of Gu Su
description: In the ancient city of Gu Su during the Qing Dynasty, embark on a quest to find adorable cats! Let the cats collide with historical scenes and characters in amusing ways."

name: GreenColdBody
description: You will play as a video blogger, surrounded by some kind of terrifying force, still striving to express the Love in your heart. This game can only be played up to 2.5 times.

name: The Outreach
description: Welcome Human-V1399 to the "Human Restoration Program," the final hope for the rebirth of mankind. In this physics-based movement shooter, use telekinetic powers to defeat hostile alien-built creatures through the depths of an irradiated planet in a conflict-ridden solar system.

name: Magiball Masters
description: Welcome, fellow Wizard! We invite you to compete with other players by reflecting a homing projectile (called Magiball). Failure to do so will result in your death! Cast your spell at the right time to reflect the Magiball to another player and win the round!

name: Nonetheless
description: An atmospheric puzzler that begins simply, but soon splays out into complex directions.

name: Harsh.
description: Harsh. is a fast, challenging action roguelite filled with emergent combinations, agressive music, engaging bossfights and diverse enemies. Your dash is the only way to switch guns and recharge your ammo. Choose buffs to create strong combinations and try to reach the core.

name: Hand of Anima
description: Fuse cards together in this roguelike deckbuilder to unleash their full potential. Discover powerful fusion combinations, craft unique decks, harness the power of ancient runes, and conquer challenging enemies on your quest to restore peace to the realm of Erdia.

name: Queen,Don't be afraid
description: In this game, you play as the Queen of the Insectoid race, instead of being a righteous messenger. Your objective is to create intricate mazes underground in the city to resist the human soldiers who come to vanquish you!

name: Bone Meal
description: Plant strange mutated crop in a chilling rogue-like with strategic resource management. Use a wide variety of seeds through three seasons to survive the blinding glow of the sun. Brew tonics, produce biofuel, upgrade facilities, and don't go hungry.

name: Earthling of Gaia
description: Save your goddess Gaia from all incoming enemies by manipulating the earth around you!

name: Joe 'n Jo
description: Joe ‘n Jo is a challenging physics-based platformer about two giraffes who are strapped together for eternity. Play solo or with a friend and make your way through unique environments that will test your coordination and patience!

name: Reminiscence in the Rain
description: The world's most "sentimental" tale. "Let's go away together." Those were Yuika Aoi's last words. It was the winter of my first year of college. She disappeared, without a trace. Where had she gone? - only the flower knows.

name: The Sacrifice
description: Immerse yourself in this dark atmospheric puzzle game set in the region of Salem in the 17th century! Help Sarah guide her father with her magical play board and avoid the many dangers of The Sacrifice.

name: Spring Dogs: Ultimate Multiplayer Battle Royale
description: Step into the frenetic universe of Spring Dogs and strive to emerge victorious in this locally focused multiplayer battle royale. Customize your character and challenge up to 17 AI-controlled competitors, 8 human players in split-screen, or 16 in team mode.

name: Swarm Fortress
description: Build walls, turrets and summon allies to survive hordes of enemies in this top-down sandbox base builder.

name: Terra Exodus
description: Defend the evacuation of Terra on the losing side of an alien invasion. This experimental action strategy game breaks out of genre norms to provide fresh mechanics to strategic gaming.

name: LightGone
description: Step into the darkness with Ashley, a college dropout lost in a mysterious world devoid of light. Traverse eerie liminal locales and evade lurking monsters to unravel the mysteries of this chilling 2D game with horror elements. Can you lead Ashley to safety, or will the shadows consume her?

name: Prospect Renegade
description: Ascend to greatness from lone contractor to industrial powerhouse through exploration, construction, conflict, and business savvy, will you keep your integrity or become the next tyrant?

name: Small Wars: Mohicans
description: Small Wars: Mohicans offers you a quick and fun to play experience of the French & Indian War (1754-1760) in the vast wilderness of 18th century North America. Play the French and their Indigenous Allies or Britain troops and colonials and gain control of the new world.

name: The Universe of Red Hope
description: Embark on an awe-inspiring journey through the cosmos with "The Universe of Red Hope," a mesmerizing space simulation game that brings the wonders of the universe right to your screen. ✨

name: VGA Planets Nu
description: A graphical multi-player play by turn war game that simulates combat in space between galactic empires.

name: Lawless Racer: 2D Street Racing
description: Lawless Racer is a retro top-down street racing game with everything modernized. Race! Earn money! And be the king of the streets of Rome with your tuned, 4 wheeled, monster.

name: Cities: Skylines II - San Francisco Set
description: Bring some sunny vibes to your city with this San Francisco themed set. A Muscle Car Garage building, 5 different Muscle car models and a police vehicle will spruce up your bustling beach city. Included in the set is also the iconic Golden Gate Bridge and of course - a San Francisco map.

name: Cities: Skylines II - Bridges & Ports
description: Livelier coasts are now available with this new expansion, Bridges & Ports! With a new set of tools you are now able to create a bustling port to your city, and add beautiful new details like draw bridges and lighthouses.

name: Project Circle
description: This is an action fighting game in which one character explores the map. There are many enemies in the map and you need to defeat them.

name: Wrath of Towers
description: In this game, your task will be to create a reliable defense that can withstand the onslaught of enemies. You will have to build various towers that will help you hold back the enemy advance.

name: Dungeons of Alethrion
description: Dungeons of Alethrion is a dungeon crawler roguelike game based on the Youtube animated series, Tales of Alethrion. Play as epic heroes from the show, each with unique abilities. Play it alone or grab a friend to join you in the dungeons!

name: XXX, I Want You to Keep Fighting
description: A highly flexible semi-automatic idle game where you can intervene in battles and character development to have a huge boost up. Also, through conversations between the protagonists, you'll hear a story steeped in the past, narrating the origins of them.

name: Harvest Cafe
description: Explore, grow, repair and cook delicious food! Harvest Cafe combines an open-world adventure with a restaurant business simulation, giving you the opportunity to enjoy farm life.

name: Fishdom: Seasons Under the Sea
description: Celebrate the holiday season with Fishdom: Seasons Under the Sea! Solve match 3 puzzles and build up your Halloween, Thanksgiving, and Christmas aquariums.

name: Flowers Mosaics
description: A game full of mosaic puzzles with a botanical theme. Enjoy colorful flower backgrounds while solving nonograms at your own pace.

name: Four Seasons Around the World: Winter in New York
description: Follow the French photographer on his journey through many puzzles. See how the story about Francois and his girlfriend unravels while absorbing the winter magic in New York City.

name: Frozen Kingdom
description: When an evil wizard turns Fairy Land into a dark, cold winter, it is your job to help a friendly magician restore the land to an eternal summer with bright colors, warmth, and merry laughter. Help the magician by solving match 3 puzzles.

name: FunPark Beach Blast
description: The hottest, grooviest spot on the beach, and you're in charge of the show! Join Jamie Madigan for a summer working the roller coasters at a seaside amusement park. Are there enough thrills, twists and loops for everyone in this 50s-themed time management game?

name: Galactic Express
description: Your mission: Take command of Galactic Express - the busiest shipping station in the galaxy! Engage your expert packing skills to load colorful cargo into transport ships before they launch to destinations across the universe. You'll earn power-ups and profits as you fill special orders from the solar system and beyond.

name: Galaxy Quest
description:
Save your partner in Galaxy Quest, an intergalactic match-3 mission! During a routine research flight, your partner and his crew are sucked into a wormhole. With nothing more than his final distorted radio transmission to guide you, you set out to find them.

Unearthly dangers and challenges await you, but luckily, so do helpful extraterrestrials who are eager to help you on your journey. Together, you'll experience a unique adventure and a one-of-a-kind match-3 game.

name: Witch Challenge
description:
Witch Challenge, Basque mythology once again avaliable in tablets and smartphones!

Return to the world of Basque mythology with Pirulina. You will test your skills in three different trials. Tartalo, Basajaun, Mari, Gaueko and other famous characters will help you overcome every challenge.

Have fun playing 3 different minigames and compete with your friends. Let's see who can make it to the top of the ranking!

name: Gaslamp Cases 4: The Arcane Village
description: Detective Morgan Johnson and his partner Jack Brown have solved many cases that have left their colleagues stumped, but the one mystery they've never answered is the origin of their friend Eleanor. While following Eleanor's trail, Morgan and Jack find themselves stranded near an isolated village where dark rituals are performed.

name: Girls With Secrets
description: You play as a woman who starts investigating the murder of her best friend. Interrogate suspects, find hidden objects, collect evidence, solve minigames and finally -- catch the true killer!

name: Kokojokoa
description:
Hara! The coconuts are stored in the drawing notebook! Are you coming to find Iki, Raz, Meme, Koi, Poz, Ule and Fux? We will live a journey full of strange images !!

“Coconut Game” is an imaginative journey consisting of 4 games + 4 games in which the character Io goes in search of coconuts.
It is aimed at young children and anyone with an interest in bizarre drawings. It is very intuitive. We will be accompanied by a character named Io and we will help him find the 7 coconuts that are saved in the drawing notebook.

name: Gizmos: Jungle Adventures
description: Explore mysterious jungles with old friends and solve 120 nonogram puzzles together.

name: Secret Agent: Mission One
description: As a secret agent you have to find and infiltrate the secret hideout of a megalomaniac who threatens to destroy the world's largest cities unless he is made ruler of the world.

name: Revenge of the C5
description: Sin descripción

name: Ice Slider Z
description: Sin descripción

name: Master Mariner
description: Sin descripción

name: Not so Simple Sonic Advance 2 Worlds
description: Not so Simple Sonic Advance 2 Worlds (or Not so Simple Sonic Advance Worlds 2, you can call it either way) is a work in progress Sonic Advance 2 framework made in Not so Simple Sonic Worlds and it is the sequel to the first Sonic Advance framework released back in April 2021. Much like the actual game It features the returning cast from Sonic Advance along with Cream the Rabbit being introduced into the mix.

name: Touhou Heisatsu Yuugi
description: A little strange ACT game where Reimu brandishes a special wand.

name: Peggle 2: Windy the Fairy Master Pack
description: Peggle 2 has become more masterly, thanks to the addition of a sparkling new Peggle Master – Windy the Fairy! This impish little sprite wants nothing more than to enable huge scores with the help of her incredible Fairy Flock power, which magically transforms lowly blue pegs into ferociously high-scoring purple pegs. With Fairy Flock even the simplest shots become Free Ball-earning monsters, and great shots become titanic monuments to the acquisition of points. Containing 10 new levels, 10 new trials, 30 additional objectives, 3 costumes and 3 new achievements, Windy’s Master Pack is a Peggler's dream!

name: Starseed: Asnia Trigger
description:
“We can change the future of humanity, if we work together.”
One step forward to the destruction of humanity, cry hope with an AI girl!

name: Eons Away
description: Eons Away is a turn-based RPG with unique combat mechanics. Explore a vibrant, handpainted world overshadowed by an encroaching corruption. Every decision is important, be it how you fight your battles or the bonds you make. Choose your path wisely.

name: I Dont Even Know
description: A puzzle game filled with various, random challenges similar to the WarioWare series. Though with no time limit, players must figure out how to pass each level with the guidance of vague instructions.

name: Modules
description: Modules is a VR art experience by Maxim Zhestkov, where architecture, sculpture, film, and music blend together to immerse viewers into the artist's world.

name: Double Header: Complete Onside Soccer and Power Slide
description: The first new officially licensed 3DO releases in over a dozen years! This two-disc set is twice the fun at only the price of one! Onside Soccer is one of the most advanced fully feature soccer games ever released. Packed full of options and customizations, Onside Soccer plays the game you want to play the way you want to play it! Second disc includes a playable beta version of Power Slide. Packaged in a two game set complete with attractive protective case and full color printed discs.

name: Down the Drain
description: Guide the water droplet to the cup below by drawing a drain pipe. Try to avoid spikes and other hazards.

name: The King's League
description: Kurestal Kingdom has prospered under the diligent reign of its King. However, the current King is already old of age - and has no heir. His Madjesty has hence declared a league - The King's League - that whoever emerges champion will be eligible to battle him and ascend his throne.

name: The King's League: Emblems
description:
Years have passed since the events of the previous league.
The King's League is now held again, promising gold and glory for the winner—and a private audience with His Majesty.
For this, three individuals embark on a journey to collect emblems to qualify for the King's League.

name: Frank Fux
description:
In this daring adventure, you as Frank Fux try to using wit and jumping power to escape the depths of the dungeon and satisfy your greed.

Navigate Frank from platform to platform with only one direction in mind - upwards!
But be careful! A wrong jump can quickly send you back into the depths.

name: Pokemon Mystery Universe
description: Pokemon Mystery Universe is a Pokémon Mystery Dungeon role-playing game that's massive, multiplayer, and online - become a Pokémon and explore the world with your friends!

name: Pixel of War
description: You are "Crados" and you will murder the Pixel of War. The Epic (and short) adventure of Conquest, Destiny and Revenge.

name: Out of Print
description:
A reunion with an old friend leads you to discover a card game you've never heard of.
Buy, trade, and win cards to boost the value of your deck.

name: Grabbers in the Woods
description: A unique first person atmospheric exploration game set in a surreal woods nestled within the confines of a bizarre dream known as the Collective Reverie, a nexus of all dreamers where their individual hopes and fears coalesce into a bizarre nightmare.

name: New York Shark
description: New York Shark is another episode of the Shark series. Control the shark and destroy New York!

name: Super Chuck Norris Bros
description: Sin descripción

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Path to the King of the Pirates & Soul Map 3
description: Gol D. Roger, the King of Pirates, a man who took everything the world had to offer. Push yourself to the limit as you attempt to surpass his legend!

name: Sandvich Maker
description: Heavy and Pyro want to make the biggest sandvich ever, and you will help them!
